mapper.select: select review_id, u_id, review_u_id, review_content, to_char(review_created,'YYYY-MM-DD') from REVIEW ORDER BY review_created DESC
mapper.insert: insert into REVIEW(review_id, u_id, review_u_id, review_content, review_created) values( NVL((select max (review_id)from review),0)+1, #{u_id}, #{review_u_id}, #{review_content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select review_id, u_id, review_u_id, review_content, review_created from REVIEW where u_id=#{u_id}
